definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Jon 4:6 a plant (cf. As, Kukkânîtum ([[כ]]) a garden-plant, D1:HWB 327);—usu. ricinus (R. communis, Linn. = castor-oil tree; cf. Dioscor.:iv. 164 ki/ki (Egypt) = kro/twn [castor-oil tree]; Talm. [[שֶׁמֶן קִיק]] v. esp. Löw:p. 353 f.); perh. < bottle-gourd (LXX kolo/kunqa; i.e. cucurbita lagenaria, a vine growing and withering rapidly, Post in Hastings:DB ii. 250);—Jon 4:6, Jon 4:6, Jon 4:7, Jon 4:9, Jon 4:10.
